Name: Bao Bao
Description: Bao Bao was a friendly panda who was always loved by all the guests at his zoo. However, Bao Bao longed for freedom and unlike the other pandas dreamt of it. The founder seeing this once again took pity on the kind hearted Bao Bao and brought him to his gameshow it was a win-win scenario as Bao Bao could show how strong he really is, entertain the crowds, and have fun while winning as well.
